definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: thing got or aquired, acquisition (Aramaism, Lag BN:205) ; abs. ´[[ק]]: Ez Eze 38:12, Eze 38:13; cstr.[[קִנְיַן]] Le 22:11; sf. [[קִנְיׇֽנְךָ]] Pr 4:7 +, etc.;—

thing acquired by purchase [[קִנְיַן כֶּסֶף]] Le 22:11 (H ; cf. [[מִקְנׇה]]); of property Ge 34:23, Ge 36:6, Jos 14:4 (all P), Ez Eze 38:12, Eze 38:13 (in all disting. fr. [[מִקְנֶה]] cattle); ‖[[בַּיִת ]] Ps 105:21; [[מִקְנֵח קִנְיׇנוֹ]] Ge 31:18 (P; prob. doublet, LXX om.); [[בְּכָל־קִנְיׇנְֽךָ קְנֵה בִינׇה]] Pr 4:7 with (or at the price of) all that thou hast acquired, get understanding.
mere gen.: coll. creatures LXX kti/siv Ps 104:24 (cf. √
